mapper.select: /* 매일 9시에 다음날 상담이 있는 고객한테 문자 보낼 주문을 추출 */ SELECT A.ORDER_NUM, E.COUNSEL_NM as sndNm, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(IFNULL(E.MOBILE,A.SND_MOBILE)),'1234') as sndMobile, /* 인테이크에 입력한 휴대폰번호로 메시지가 날라가도록 수정, 인테이크에 입력된 정보가 없으면 주문에 있는 휴대펀번호로 */ B.COUNSELOR_ID, B.COUNSEL_CD, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y년%m월%d일%H시') AS scheduleDt, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%m월%d일 %H시') AS scheduleDtMonth, C.TEL_NUM as centerTelNum, C.CENTER_NM as centerNm, C.ADDR1 as centerAddr1, C.ADDR2 as centerAddr2, D.USER_NM as counselorNm, D.MOBILE as counselorMobile, A.CLIENT_CD as clientCd, B.COUNSEL_TYPE AS counselType, B.center_seq as centerSeq, IF(F.SITE_NM IS NULL or F.SITE_NM = '', '상담포유', F.SITE_NM) as siteNm FROM MIND_ORDER A INNER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL B ON A.COUNSEL_CD = B.COUNSEL_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CENTER C ON B.CENTER_SEQ = C.CENTER_SEQ INNER JOIN MIND_MGR D ON B.COUNSELOR_ID = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE E ON B.INTAKE_CD=E.INTAKE_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CLIENT F ON A.CLIENT_CD =F.CLIENT_CD WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(B.schedule_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND B.CANCEL_DT IS NULL -- 취소가 아니고 AND A.REF_ORDER_NUM IS NULL -- 취소 재주문도 아닌거 AND A.CLIENT_CD != 'police'

/* 매일 9시에 다음날 상담이 있는 고객한테 문자 보낼 주문을 추출 */ SELECT A.ORDER_NUM, E.COUNSEL_NM as sndNm, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(IFNULL(E.MOBILE,A.SND_MOBILE)),'1234') as sndMobile, /* 인테이크에 입력한 휴대폰번호로 메시지가 날라가도록 수정, 인테이크에 입력된 정보가 없으면 주문에 있는 휴대펀번호로 */ B.COUNSELOR_ID, B.COUNSEL_CD, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y년%m월%d일%H시') AS scheduleDt, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%m월%d일 %H시') AS scheduleDtMonth, C.TEL_NUM as centerTelNum, C.CENTER_NM as centerNm, C.ADDR1 as centerAddr1, C.ADDR2 as centerAddr2, D.USER_NM as counselorNm, D.MOBILE as counselorMobile, A.CLIENT_CD as clientCd, B.COUNSEL_TYPE AS counselType, B.center_seq as centerSeq, IF(F.SITE_NM IS NULL or F.SITE_NM = '', '상담포유', F.SITE_NM) as siteNm FROM MIND_ORDER A INNER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL B ON A.COUNSEL_CD = B.COUNSEL_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CENTER C ON B.CENTER_SEQ = C.CENTER_SEQ INNER JOIN MIND_MGR D ON B.COUNSELOR_ID = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE E ON B.INTAKE_CD=E.INTAKE_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CLIENT F ON A.CLIENT_CD =F.CLIENT_CD WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(B.schedule_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND B.CANCEL_DT IS NULL -- 취소가 아니고 AND A.REF_ORDER_NUM IS NULL -- 취소 재주문도 아닌거 AND A.CLIENT_CD = 'police'
